phrases: the pain and agony of being burned alive,
the sensation of insects eating the flesh off your bones...
Not a single person knows what it is like.
Everyone scoffs at me and calls me a freak.
Do you want people to understand?
Or do you just want to believe you are the only one suffering?
something you are in a position to say?
You are quite blessed, are not you?
Every day, you are being targeted for your body, your blood, your soul...
But you had no trouble getting food, shelter, or education.
The only ones having trouble are the adults who have to raise a creepy child.
you are the one who acts as though you are the one suffering most.
I lived my life despising and envying all sorts of things, too.
I thought I could do anything to escape the misery.
You and I may be alike...
and that is why I need to beat the hell out of you.
You think you are in the right just because you tried to die?
After you gave the people around you so much hell for it?
I do not think I am in the right.
I see the human child has served her purpose well.
A human heart in motion is so beautiful.
These are the things that move the world.
You and he are both very, very beautiful to me.
Well, well, he is finally arrived.
Kids these days do not know how to treat their elders.
So you are the ones who scarred this girl so brutally.
Let us do this, you failure.
I am not doing this for you.
We are aligned in our opinions.
She is going to be trouble.
I do not have time for this.
Ruth, keep an eye on Chise.
Nettles in the shadow, ring of holly...
Maybe you have suffered more than me or anyone I have ever met.
But just because it hurts does not mean you can make others suffer with you,
or that you can do anything you want!
So it is only okay if it is you?!
What is the difference between what you tried to earn
by sacrificing yourself, and what I want?!
Resound, resound, forest song of the night.
Hear, hear, the howling of the grave keeper.
Sleep magic does not work on me.
I want you to bind us together so that
no matter what happens, we will not be separated.
It hurts when no one understands.
One, two, where do you bloom?
Under the window where the children sleep,
white flowers on the night of a pale moon...
Three, four, where do you bloom?
On the frame of Mommy's mirror,
Let us count, let us count, let us find and count the flowers...
In the dream in which the child sleeps.
Mommy will give you a bouquet of flowers.
Mommy will give you a bouquet of flowers...
I would not want to do this for millennia.
I reached a bit of an understanding with the dragon inside of you.
I am going to keep you alive, and the dragon will someday kill you.
We will be inside of you, keeping each other in check.
So nothing will happen to you right away.
Oh, but that is how it is for all ordinary beings, is not it?
Now, Elias, let us hear your excuse.
Why did you do such a thing to Stella without even talking to me first?
If you are going to go there, I have something I want to say, too.
You are always the one who does things without consulting me.
I just said we would think things through together from now on,
and look at what you go and do!
Do not put myself in danger.
Back down if I am about to get hurt.
Talk to someone before I take action.
That was the result of our discussion.
Stella's back to normal, and the witches have stopped coming to recruit us.
The two dragons are back with Lindel.
I do not think he will be back for a few decades, at least.
Are not you going to wake up?
I cannot stand that weirdo getting in my face anymore.
The suffering one has found a place to rest his head.
We were waiting for you, Robin.
We talked on the phone plenty of times, but how are you?
My stomach's fine now, but I cannot push myself as much as I could before.
You just admitted that you were pushing yourself.
I cannot believe you would ask for such a thing, though.
I do not really mean anything by it.
Do you have a fever or something?
You thought it was my birthday, did not you?
You said you have never had a birthday party before, so I am hosting one.
Oh, it is true that it is my birthday today, though.
Let us enjoy it together today.
I asked my aunt to make it for you.
I was going to go straight home, but...
It is not what you were wearing when you left this morning.
Stella gave it to me as a gift.
Just give me your left hand.
If anything happens to either of us, it will let us know.
I thought it might... put you at ease.
I have heard that the left ring finger is for wedding rings.
It is only been a year, but so much has changed since you bought me.
I met all kinds of people, and all kinds of people helped me along.
The world is a lot bigger than I would ever thought.
It is not that I was reborn, and I still resent being in this body.
But now, I can allow myself to think...
that I get to be here because I did not jump back then.
You alone did not bring me to that conclusion,
but it would not have worked without you.
I do not intend to ever again do anything that you might dislike.
by being involved with you, I may become monstrous again.
Are you still okay with me?
Words are not for understanding each other.
They exist for the sake of talking to each other.
If we butt heads, if we cannot understand each other,
we will talk it over together.
So that we can find a sweet spot.
May I walk next alongside you going forward?
You are my bride, after all.
Should you quit being my apprentice?
It is still embarrassing to say.
